page.title: 09MINSTERLEY C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: Our school has four classes & 112 children between five & eleven years old. We have a hall for P.E., singing, acting & school dinners. There is a library, a cookery area & a patio.In the corridors are displays of our paintings, writing & models. The field is used for sports & fetes. We have lessons of mathematics, R.E., science, music, English, P.E..,art & craft & topics. We have a computer, a film projector, a cooker & an overhead projector. We go on trips. Some of the trips have been to Butterfly World, Weston Park, Shrewsbury Fire Station & railway station & the field centre at Stiperstones. After school there are clubs like choir, chess, Y.O.C. & concerts.
